title: The Christmas Calamity
description: Have you ever had something take you by surprise?Experience the magic of the holiday season in this sweet Victorian romance.Dependable and solid, Arlan Guthry relishes his orderly life as a bankerâ€™s assistant in Hardman, Oregon.His uncluttered world spins off kilter when the beautiful and enigmatic prestidigitator Alexandra Janowski arrives in town, spinning magic and trouble in her wake as the holiday season approaches.
author: Shanna Hatfield
